OpportunityContactRoleSuggestionInsight.name: OpportunityContactRoleSuggestionInsight
OpportunityContactRoleSuggestionInsight.description: Represents a suggestion for a new opportunity contact role.

ContactId.description: The ID of the related contact record.

CreatedRecordId.description: The ID of the created opportunity contact role record.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for orgs with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

Division.description: The division of the suggested opportunity contact role.

LastOperationUserId.description: The ID of the user who last performed a related operation.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last interacted with this record, directly or indirectly. Some sample scenarios are:

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that the user only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed it.

OpportunityId.description: The ID of the related opportunity.

RationaleLabel.description: The reason why this is a suggested opportunity contact role.

Role.description: The role of the suggested opportunity contact role.

Status.description: The status of the suggested contact. Possible values include: New Pending Added Declined
